cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katei

sentence.kanji: 仮定の話だけでは結論は出ません。
sentence.romaji: katei no hanashi dake de ha ketsuron ha demasen
sentence.english: A conclusion can't come from assumptions alone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kari

sentence.kanji: 仮の申し込みをしました。
sentence.romaji: kari no moushikomi wo shimashita
sentence.english: I submitted a temporary application.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dantai

sentence.kanji: サッカーは団体競技です。
sentence.romaji: saka- ha dantai kyougi desu
sentence.english: Soccer is a team event.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotai

sentence.kanji: 氷は固体です。
sentence.romaji: koori ha kotai desu
sentence.english: Ice is a solid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanbyaku

sentence.kanji: 海で何百もの美しい魚を見ました。
sentence.romaji: umi de nanbyaku mo no utsukushii sakana wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw hundreds of beautiful fish in the sea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shusai

sentence.kanji: その芸術祭は市が主催しています。
sentence.romaji: sono geijutsusai ha shi ga shusai shite imasu
sentence.english: The art festival is sponsored by the city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moyooshi

sentence.kanji: 学校の催しに参加しました。
sentence.romaji: gakou no moyooshi ni sanka shimashita
sentence.english: I took part in the event at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は化学の教授です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kagaku no kyouju desu
sentence.english: He's a chemistry professor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiiku

sentence.kanji: 今日は体育の授業があります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha taiiku no jugyou ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a PE lesson today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otetsudai

sentence.kanji: 何かお手伝いしましょうか。
sentence.romaji: nani ka otetsudai shimashou ka
sentence.english: Is there anything I can do to help?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotozukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女への伝言を言付けたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo he no dengon wo kotozuketa no
sentence.english: I left her a message.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshu

sentence.kanji: あの村は伝統を保守している。
sentence.romaji: ano mura ha dentou wo hoshu shite iru
sentence.english: That village keeps up traditions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutawaru

sentence.kanji: 漢字は中国から伝わった。
sentence.romaji: kanji ha chuugoku kara tsutawata
sentence.english: Chinese characters were transmitted from China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's densetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は数々の伝説を残しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kazukazu no densetsu wo nokoshimashita
sentence.english: He left behind a lot of legends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsudai

sentence.kanji: 会議の準備に手伝いが必要です。
sentence.romaji: kaigi no junbi ni tetsudai ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: We need help with preparations for the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dengon

sentence.kanji: 課長から伝言があります。
sentence.romaji: kachou kara dengon ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a message from the section chief.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gendai

sentence.kanji: 現代の科学の進歩には驚くよ。
sentence.romaji: gendai no kagaku no shinpo ni ha odoroku yo
sentence.english: The advancement of contemporary science surprises me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuka

sentence.kanji: ご注文の品は明日出荷致します。
sentence.romaji: gochuumon no shina ha asu shuka itashimasu
sentence.english: We will ship the ordered goods tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katamuku

sentence.kanji: お日様が西に傾きましたね。
sentence.romaji: ohisama ga nishi ni katamukimashita ne
sentence.english: The sun went down in the west.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katamukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は首を少し傾けて笑うの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kubi wo sukoshi katamukete warau no
sentence.english: She cocks her head slightly to the side when she smiles.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itameru

sentence.kanji: 彼は柔道で腰を傷めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha juudou de koshi wo itameta n da
sentence.english: He hurt his lower back doing judo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitomae

sentence.kanji: 彼女は人前に出ると緊張します。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hitomae ni deru to kinchou shimasu
sentence.english: She feels nervous in front of other people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teishi

sentence.kanji: 突然、機械が停止してしまったの。
sentence.romaji: totsuzen kikai ga teishi shite shimata no
sentence.english: The machine stopped suddenly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kutsukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は壁に耳をくっ付けて隣の話を聞いていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kabe ni mimi wo kutsukete tonari no hanashi wo kiite ita no
sentence.english: He pressed his ear to the wall and listened to what the people next door were saying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikutai

sentence.kanji: 肉体はいつか滅びます。
sentence.romaji: nikutai ha itsuka horobimasu
sentence.english: Our bodies must perish at some time or another.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gara

sentence.kanji: 彼は犬の柄のTシャツを着ているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha inu no gara no Tshatsu wo kite iru yo
sentence.english: He's wearing a T-shirt with a dog print on it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitogara

sentence.kanji: みんな彼の温かい人柄が大好きだよ。
sentence.romaji: minna kare no atatakai hitogara ga daisuki da yo
sentence.english: Everyone loves his warm personality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shijin

sentence.kanji: 彼は優れた詩人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sugureta shijin desu
sentence.english: He is a fine poet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meijin

sentence.kanji: 彼は釣りの名人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tsuri no meijin desu
sentence.english: He's an expert angler.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiniku

sentence.kanji: 彼は皮肉ばかり言います。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hiniku bakari iimasu
sentence.english: He always says sarcastic things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makaseru

sentence.kanji: この仕事は君に任せる。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ha kimi ni makaseru
sentence.english: I leave this work up to you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gishiki

sentence.kanji: 儀式には作法があります。
sentence.romaji: gishiki ni ha sahou ga arimasu
sentence.english: Ceremonies have their rules of etiquette.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyougi

sentence.kanji: この子は本当に行儀の良い子です。
sentence.romaji: kono ko ha hontou ni gyougi no ii ko desu
sentence.english: This child is very well behaved.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hotoke

sentence.kanji: 仏の教えを勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: hotoke no oshie wo benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: I studied the teachings of Buddha.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinniku

sentence.kanji: 彼は最近筋肉を鍛えているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saikin kinniku wo kitaete iru yo
sentence.english: He has been building up his muscles recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zabuton

sentence.kanji: この座布団は座り心地がいいね。
sentence.romaji: kono zabuton ha suwari gokochi ga ii ne
sentence.english: This cushion is comfortable to sit on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanayome

sentence.kanji: 花嫁が父親と一緒に入ってきましたね。
sentence.romaji: hanayome ga chichioya to isho ni haite kimashita ne
sentence.english: The bride entered with her father.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanamuko

sentence.kanji: 花婿と花嫁が並んで登場したんだ。
sentence.romaji: hanamuko to hanayome ga narande toujou shita n da
sentence.english: The bride and bridegroom appeared side by side.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moyoosu

sentence.kanji: 静かな音楽で眠気を催したよ。
sentence.romaji: shizuka na ongaku de nemuke wo moyooshita yo
sentence.english: I felt sleepy due to the quiet music.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoikuen

sentence.kanji: 娘を保育園に迎えに行きます。
sentence.romaji: musume wo hoikuen ni mukae ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to pick up my daughter at day-care.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's narau

sentence.kanji: この街はロンドンに倣って作られました。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ha rondon ni narate tsukuraremashita
sentence.english: This town was built to look like London.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ore

sentence.kanji: 俺の頼みを聞いてくれ。
sentence.romaji: ore no tanomi wo kiite kure
sentence.english: Do me a favor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senden

sentence.kanji: その商品の宣伝をよく見かけます。
sentence.romaji: sono shouhin no senden wo yoku mikakemasu
sentence.english: I often see advertisements for this product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitosashiyubi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は人差し指を怪我したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hitosashiyubi wo kega shita no 。
sentence.english: She injured her forefinger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuchou

sentence.kanji: 彼は府庁で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fuchou de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: He works for the prefectural office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinkaku

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の人格を尊敬しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no jinkaku wo sonkei shite imasu
sentence.english: I respect his character.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nazukeru

sentence.kanji: 子猫にトラと名付けました。
sentence.romaji: koneko ni tora to nazukemashita
sentence.english: I named the kitten "Tora".

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakunin

sentence.kanji: 叔父は役人として30年働きました。
sentence.romaji: oji ha yakunin to shite 30 nen hatarakimashita
sentence.english: My uncle worked as a government official for 30 years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's e

sentence.kanji: この傘は柄が丈夫だな。
sentence.romaji: kono kasa ha e ga joubu da na
sentence.english: The handle of this umbrella is strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fu

sentence.kanji: 彼は大阪府に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oosakafu ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: He lives in Osaka Prefecture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kutsuku

sentence.kanji: 靴の底にガムがくっ付いてしまった。
sentence.romaji: kutsu no soko ni gamu ga kutsuite shimata
sentence.english: Chewing gum got stuck to the sole of my shoe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's densen

sentence.kanji: その国ではコレラの伝染が蔓延しています。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni de ha korera no densen ga manen shite imasu
sentence.english: There's a spreading cholera epidemic in that country.
